description: Performs a back of StackStorm MongoDB database
name: mongodb_backup

mongodb_admin_password.default: {% set pw = st2kv.system.mongodb.admin_password | string %}{{ pw | decrypt_kv if pw else '' }}

retention_days.description: Passed into the find command. Deletes files based on this value. To find files older than n days it should be +n . If you specify just n it will find files that are exactly n days old.
